text: Eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Niccayamāka nāṉ eṉ cantatiyāriliruntum, caṅkaiyāṉa uṉ vīṭṭiṉ (kaḥpāviṉ) arukē, vivacāyamillāta (ip)paḷḷattākkil, eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! - Toḻukaiyai avarkaḷ nilai niṟuttāṭṭuvataṟkākak kuṭiyēṟṟiyirukkiṉṟēṉ; eṉavē makkaḷil oru tokaiyiṉariṉ itayaṅkaḷai avarkaḷpāl cāyntiṭac ceyvāyāka! Iṉṉum avarkaḷ naṉṟi celuttum poruṭṭu kaṉivarkkaṅkaḷiliruntu avarkaḷukku nī ākāramum aḷippāyāka
